column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The eccentric creator has a request for Azem's familiar.
Use fine aetheric rope to capture restless plants.
Deliver the bound plants to the eccentric creator.
You must be Azem's familiar. I had a favor to ask of the observers here, but seeing as they all seem awfully preoccupied, perhaps I can ask you instead.
I'm experimenting with crossbreeding different types of plants. I was thrilled when I finally produced a whole new species...right up until the point where they rose up and floated away.
Last I saw of them, they were headed toward the eastern side of the island. I managed to wrangle a goodly number, but there are still eight or so missing. Could you help me recapture them?
Thank you. Here, use this aetheric rope to capture say, four of them, and I can hopefully handle the rest.
Thank goodness for that, though I'd expect no less from Azem's familiar. I rounded up my half as well, which means they're all back safe and sound.
They're part yggdreant, you see. It's no surprise they inherited the eyes, but having them wander off on their own was rather unexpected.

To tell the truth, I never really had a specific use in mind for them. I suppose I'd best start thinking about that... The Bureau of the Architect won't be impressed with my new creation unless it serves a purpose.
With that in mind, I believe there's research to be done. Thank you for your help, and do pass on my regards to Azem.
